attributes.action: stop the closing of eye department at croydon university hospital
attributes.background: i have been told by staff at croydon university hospital they plan to close eye dept i find this unacceptable and think we should do something about this so lets tell them

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for Croydon Health Services NHS Trust, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out how to contact the Trust here:

https://www.croydonhealthservices.nhs.uk/about-us/Contact-us.htm
